title: Removing support for Android ARMv6
body:
I am busy updating to skia m52, but having issues when building ARMv6. As a temporary workaround, I am removing the armeabi ABI.

If this is needed, leave a comment and I can re-look at it.

The issue I am having is that when building for armeabi, the _ARM_NEON_ clang flag is defined, this results in linker error due to the fact that the code assumes that it can use NEON features.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Closing this as no-one seems to ming :) 
Can be re-opened later.
